about_the_game:
Package includes:
- The Original Soundtrack for Particle Fleet:Emergence
- A PDF book with over 50 pages of development notes and diagrams.
- Corporation in the Game. Allows you to design a logo and specify a name and CEO that appears in player games.
detailed_description:
Package includes:
- The Original Soundtrack for Particle Fleet:Emergence
- A PDF book with over 50 pages of development notes and diagrams.
- Corporation in the Game. Allows you to design a logo and specify a name and CEO that appears in player games.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Quad Core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Quad Core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
